answers.answer: I think they gain half a pound every week the last couple of weeks so she may be around 8lbs. That being said the ultrasounds are not always accurate when determining weight so she may not be quite as big as they are saying.
She's not that big..she'll prob be about 8lbs like KDQ said. My first was 8 lbs at 36 weeks. He was 10 lb 7oz at birth.
Good. I want her to not be that big. Thanks for the input.
That's exactly what they said my girl was weighing at my scan :-) 6lb 35wks - this app says 5lb5 for 35wks so our girls aren't that far off. Im thinking she will be around 7lb5-8lb
At my 33 weeks scan my baby girl was weighing 6lbs 4oz. They think she will be about 9 or 10lbs when she is born.

question: Got my growth check ultrasound today to see my baby girl. Found out she has hair and she's 6 lbs. Is that big for this far along? How can I calculate how much she'll weigh when she comes out. Im guessing7  1/2 to 8lbs? I'm wondering cause I have gestational diabetes and despite not finding out till 32 weeks she's only a week ahead thank god.  But I'm wondering how big she is going to be. Seeing her face in 4d today was such a joyful moment. I teared up a bit. Getting sooo excited and anxious.  Time is winding down now...
title: 6lbs at 35 weeks big?
